attributes.action: STOP care home workers in from being forced to have corona virus vaccinations.
attributes.additional_details: The UK has reached "a perilous turning point with potential new draconian laws being planned and discussed in Parliament. It is an established principle in English Law that an individual with the capacity to consent cannot and should not be compelled to have any medical treatment against their wishes. The Public Health (Control of Disease) Act 1984 (section 45E). "Forced vaccinations are the wrong way to go and send out a sinister and worrying message.
attributes.background: This totalitarian approach through coercion and repression does not permit individual freedom and expression of choice and must be withdrawn immediately. Please stop this erosion of our freedom of choice.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require health and social care workers to take covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842

Prohibit employers from requiring employees to have a Covid-19 vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575607
